skill_constraints: Single frontend developer creates a critical bottleneck. Under-allocated QA and documentation effort.
mitigation_strategies: Define API contracts early to allow parallel work. Prioritize critical path frontend tasks.

skill_constraints: Onboarding overhead for new frontend developer.
resource_bottlenecks: Backend API definition for new UI features.
mitigation_strategies: Add one Mid-level Frontend Developer. Plan continuous QA and documentation effort from Sprint 1.
